mainEntity.name: Why is custom backend architecture important for CleanTech platforms?

acceptedAnswer.text: Custom backend systems enable CleanTech platforms to scale securely, adapt to evolving compliance requirements, and support real-time operations such as AI forecasting, IoT automation, and ESG data governance.

mainEntity.name: How does AI improve forecasting in renewable energy?

acceptedAnswer.text: AI, particularly machine learning and ensemble models, improves day-ahead forecasting accuracy, enabling better grid balancing, reduced costs, and enhanced reliability for wind and solar energy sources.

mainEntity.name: What makes software audit-ready for ESG compliance?

acceptedAnswer.text: Audit-ready ESG software includes features like immutable audit logs, version control, standardized GHG methodologies, role-based access, and export-ready reports that align with CSRD, SEC, or GRI frameworks.

mainEntity.name: Where does blockchain fit in clean energy software?

acceptedAnswer.text: Blockchain is useful for verifying renewable energy certificates and peer-to-peer trading, but it's not ideal for real-time control. For most CleanTech use cases, purpose-built backend systems are more efficient.
